title.en: Table of Meritorious Officials of Jing, Wu, Zhao, Xuan, Yuan, and Cheng

sentences.zh: 昔書稱「蠻夷帥服」，《詩》云「徐方既來」，春秋列潞子之爵，許其慕諸夏也。

translations.literal: Formerly the Book says "barbarians and foreigners all submit", the Poetry says "Xu region has come", Spring and Autumn includes Lu Zi title, permits their admiration for Chinese states.
translations.idiomatic: Formerly the Book says 'barbarians and foreigners all submit,' the Poetry says 'Xu region has come.' The Spring and Autumn Annals includes Lu Zi's title, permitting their admiration for the Chinese states.

sentences.zh: 漢興至于孝文時，乃有弓高、襄城之封，雖自外來，本功臣後。

translations.literal: Han rise until Xiaowen time, then had Gong Gao, Xiangcheng enfeoffments, though from outside came, originally meritorious ministers descendants.
translations.idiomatic: From the rise of Han until Xiaowen's time, there were then the enfeoffments of Gong Gao and Xiangcheng, though they came from outside, they were originally descendants of meritorious ministers.

sentences.zh: 故至孝景始欲侯降者，丞相周亞夫守約而爭。

translations.literal: Therefore until Xiaojing first wanted to marquis surrenderers, Chancellor Zhou Yafu guarded covenant and contended.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore, until Xiaojing, he first wanted to make marquises of those who surrendered. Chancellor Zhou Yafu guarded the covenant and contended against it.

sentences.zh: 帝黜其議，初開封賞之科，又有吳楚之事。

translations.literal: Emperor rejected his counsel, initially opened enfeoffment reward regulations, moreover had Wu Chu affair.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor rejected his counsel and initially opened up the regulations for enfeoffment rewards. Moreover, there was the Wu and Chu affair.

sentences.zh: 武興胡越之伐，將帥受爵，應本約矣。

translations.literal: Wu rose Hu Yue conquests, generals commanders received titles, should original covenant.
translations.idiomatic: Wu expanded the conquests against the Hu and Yue, and generals and commanders received titles, which should accord with the original covenant.

sentences.zh: 後有承平，頗有勞臣，輯而序之，續元功次云。

translations.literal: Later had peace, quite had meritorious ministers, compiled and ordered them, continued primary merit sequence says.
translations.idiomatic: Later there was peace, and there were quite a few meritorious ministers. They were compiled and arranged in order, continuing the sequence of primary merits.

cells.content: 俞侯欒布
cells.literal: Yu Marquis Luan Bu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Yu: Luan Bu

cells.content: 以將軍吳楚反擊齊，侯。
cells.literal: As general Wu Chu rebellion attacked Qi, marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a general, he attacked Qi during the Wu and Chu rebellion, and was made marquis.

cells.content: 六年四月丁卯封，六年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth year fourth month dingmao day enfeoffed, six years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingmao day of the fourth month in the sixth year, died after six years.

cells.content: 中六年，侯賁嗣，二十二年，元狩六年，坐為太常雍犧牲不如令，免。
cells.literal: Middle sixth year, Marquis Ben succeeded, twenty-two years, Yuanshu sixth year, convicted as Grand Master of Ceremonies Yong sacrifices not according to regulations, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the middle sixth year, Marquis Ben succeeded him. After twenty-two years, in the sixth year of Yuanshu, he was convicted of improper sacrifices as Grand Master of Ceremonies and dismissed.

cells.content: 建陵哀侯衛綰
cells.literal: Jian Ling Ai Marquis Wei Wan
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Ai of Jian Ling: Wei Wan

cells.content: 以將軍擊吳楚，用中尉侯。
cells.literal: As general attacked Wu Chu, used Commandant marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a general, he attacked Wu and Chu. Used as Commandant, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 四月丁卯封，二十一年薨。
cells.literal: Fourth month dingmao day enfeoffed, twenty-one years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingmao day of the fourth month, died after twenty-one years.

cells.content: 元光五年，侯信嗣，十八年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuanguang fifth year, Marquis Xin succeeded, eighteen years, Yuanding fifth year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth year of Yuanguang, Marquis Xin succeeded him. After eighteen years, in the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

cells.content: 建平敬侯程嘉
cells.literal: Jian Ping Jing Marquis Cheng Jia
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Jing of Jian Ping: Cheng Jia

cells.content: 以將���擊吳楚，用江都相侯。
cells.literal: As general attacked Wu Chu, used Jiangdu chancellor marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a general, he attacked Wu and Chu. Used as chancellor of Jiangdu, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 四月丁卯封，十八年薨。
cells.literal: Fourth month dingmao day enfeoffed, eighteen years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingmao day of the fourth month, died after eighteen years.

cells.content: 元光二年，節侯橫嗣，一年薨。
cells.literal: Yuanguang second year, Jie Marquis Heng succeeded, one year died.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of Yuanguang, Jie Marquis Heng succeeded him, and died after one year.

cells.content: 三年，侯回嗣，四年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Third year, Marquis Hui succeeded, four years died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: In the third year, Marquis Hui succeeded him, died after four years with no heir.

cells.content: 平曲侯公孫渾邪
cells.literal: Ping Qu Marquis Gongsun Hun Xie
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ping Qu: Gongsun Hun Xie

cells.content: 以將軍擊吳楚，用隴西太守侯。
cells.literal: As general attacked Wu Chu, used Longxi governor marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a general, he attacked Wu and Chu. Used as governor of Longxi, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 四月己巳封，五年，中四年，有罪，免。
cells.literal: Fourth month jisi day enfeoffed, five years, middle fourth year, had crime, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the jisi day of the fourth month. After five years, in the middle fourth year, he committed a crime and was dismissed.

cells.content: 南奅元朔五年四月丁卯，侯賀以將軍擊匈奴得王，侯。十二年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Nan Xi Yuanshuo fifth year fourth month dingmao day, Marquis He as general attacked Xiongnu obtained king, marquis. Twelfth year, Yuanding fifth year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth year of Yuanshuo, on the dingmao day of the fourth month, Marquis He, as a general, attacked the Xiongnu and captured a king, and was made marquis. After twelve years, in the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

cells.content: 葛繹太初二年，侯賀復以丞相封。三年，延和二年，以子敬聲有罪，下獄死。
cells.literal: Ge Xi Taichu second year, Marquis He again as chancellor enfeoffed. Third year, Yanhe second year, because son Jing Sheng had crime, imprisoned died.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of Taichu, Marquis He was again enfeoffed as chancellor. In the third year, in the second year of Yanhe, because his son Jing Sheng committed a crime, he was imprisoned and died.

cells.content: 江陽康侯蘇息
cells.literal: Jiang Yang Kang Marquis Su Xi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Kang of Jiang Yang: Su Xi

cells.content: 以將軍擊吳楚，用趙相侯。
cells.literal: As general attacked Wu Chu, used Zhao chancellor marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a general, he attacked Wu and Chu. Used as chancellor of Zhao, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 中二年，懿侯盧嗣，八年薨。
cells.literal: Middle second year, Yi Marquis Lu succeeded, eight years died.
cells.idiomatic: In the middle second year, Yi Marquis Lu succeeded him, and died after eight years.

cells.content: 建元二年，侯朋嗣，十六年薨。
cells.literal: Jianyuan second year, Marquis Peng succeeded, sixteen years died.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of Jianyuan, Marquis Peng succeeded him, and died after sixteen years.

cells.content: 元朔六年，侯雕嗣，十一年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuanshuo sixth year, Marquis Diao succeeded, eleven years, Yuanding fifth year, convicted of tribute wine deficiency, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth year of Yuanshuo, Marquis Diao succeeded him. After eleven years, in the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of tribute wine deficiency and dismissed.

cells.content: 遽侯橫
cells.literal: Ju Marquis Heng
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ju: Heng

cells.content: 父建德以趙相不聽王遂反，死事，子侯，千一百七十戶。
cells.literal: Father Jian De as Zhao chancellor not listened to king Sui rebellion, died in service, son marquis, thousand one hundred seventy households.
cells.idiomatic: His father Jian De, as chancellor of Zhao, did not heed King Sui's rebellion and died in service. His son was made marquis with 1170 households.

cells.content: 中二年四月乙巳封，六年，後二年，有罪，棄市。
cells.literal: Middle second year fourth month yisi day enfeoffed, six years, after second year, had crime, executed in marketplace.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yisi day of the fourth month in the middle second year. After six years, in the after second year, he committed a crime and was executed in the marketplace.

cells.content: 新市侯王棄之
cells.literal: Xin Shi Marquis Wang Qi Zhi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xin Shi: Wang Qi Zhi

cells.content: 父悍以趙內史，王遂反不聽，死事，子侯。
cells.literal: Father Han as Zhao nei shi, king Sui rebellion not listened, died in service, son marquis.
cells.idiomatic: His father Han, as nei shi of Zhao, did not heed King Sui's rebellion and died in service. His son was made marquis.

cells.content: 四月乙巳封，八年薨。
cells.literal: Fourth month yisi day enfeoffed, eight years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yisi day of the fourth month, died after eight years.

cells.content: 煬侯始昌嗣，元光四年為人所賊殺。
cells.literal: Yang Marquis Shi Chang succeeded, Yuanguang fourth year by person assassinated killed.
cells.idiomatic: Yang Marquis Shi Chang succeeded him. In the fourth year of Yuanguang, he was assassinated and killed by someone.

cells.content: 商陵侯趙商
cells.literal: Shang Ling Marquis Zhao Shang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Shang Ling: Zhao Shang

cells.content: 父夷吾以楚太傅，王戊反不聽，死事，子侯。
cells.literal: Father Yi Wu as Chu tai fu, king Wu rebellion not listened, died in service, son marquis.
cells.idiomatic: His father Yi Wu, as tai fu of Chu, did not heed King Wu's rebellion and died in service. His son was made marquis.

cells.content: 四月乙巳封，三十六年，元鼎五年坐為丞相知列侯酎金輕，下獄自殺。
cells.literal: Fourth month yisi day enfeoffed, thirty-six years, Yuanding fifth year convicted as chancellor knew marquises tribute wine light, imprisoned committed suicide.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yisi day of the fourth month. After thirty-six years, in the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted as chancellor for knowing that the marquises' tribute wine was light, and imprisoned himself and committed suicide.

cells.content: 山陽侯張當居
cells.literal: Shan Yang Marquis Zhang Dang Ju
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Shan Yang: Zhang Dang Ju

cells.content: 父尚以楚相，王戊反不聽，死事，子侯。
cells.literal: Father Shang as Chu chancellor, king Wu rebellion not listened, died in service, son marquis.
cells.idiomatic: His father Shang, as chancellor of Chu, did not heed King Wu's rebellion and died in service. His son was made marquis.

cells.content: 四月乙巳封，二十四年，元朔五年，坐為太常擇博士弟子故不以實，完為城旦。
cells.literal: Fourth month yisi day enfeoffed, twenty-four years, Yuanshuo fifth year, convicted as Grand Master of Ceremonies selected Erudite disciples intentionally not with truth, completed as Cheng Dan.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yisi day of the fourth month. After twenty-four years, in the fifth year of Yuanshuo, he was convicted as Grand Master of Ceremonies for intentionally selecting Erudite disciples without truth, and completed his sentence as a Cheng Dan.

cells.content: 安陵侯于軍
cells.literal: An Ling Marquis Yu Jun
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of An Ling: Yu Jun

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯，千五百五十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis, thousand five hundred fifty households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis with 1550 households.

cells.content: 中三年十一月庚子封，十三年，建元六年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Middle third year eleventh month gengzi day enfeoffed, thirteen years, Jianyuan sixth year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the gengzi day of the eleventh month in the middle third year. After thirteen years, in the sixth year of Jianyuan, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 桓侯賜
cells.literal: Huan Marquis Ci
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Huan: Ci

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 十二月丁丑封。
cells.literal: Twelfth month dingchou day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingchou day of the twelfth month.

cells.content: 袭侯陸彊
cells.literal: Xi Marquis Lu Qiang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xi: Lu Qiang

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯，千五百七十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis, thousand five hundred seventy households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis with 1570 households.

cells.content: 十二月丁丑封。
cells.literal: Twelfth month dingchou day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingchou day of the twelfth month.

cells.content: 侯則嗣，孝武後元年坐祝詛上，要斬。
cells.literal: Marquis Ze succeeded, Xiaowu after first year convicted cursed emperor, should be executed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Ze succeeded him. In the first year after Xiaowu's reign, he was convicted of cursing the emperor and should have been executed.

cells.content: 容城倶侯徐盧
cells.literal: Rong Cheng Ju Marquis Xu Lu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Ju of Rong Cheng: Xu Lu

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯，七百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis, seven hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis with 700 households.

cells.content: 十二月丁丑封，七年薨。
cells.literal: Twelfth month dingchou day enfeoffed, seven years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingchou day of the twelfth month, died after seven years.

cells.content: 建元二年，康侯纏嗣，十四年薨。
cells.literal: Jianyuan second year, Kang Marquis Chan succeeded, fourteen years died.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of Jianyuan, Kang Marquis Chan succeeded him, and died after fourteen years.

cells.content: 元朔三年，侯光嗣，四十年，後元二年，坐祝詛上，要斬。
cells.literal: Yuanshuo third year, Marquis Guang succeeded, forty years, Houyuan second year, convicted cursed emperor, should be executed.
cells.idiomatic: In the third year of Yuanshuo, Marquis Guang succeeded him. After forty years, in the second year of Houyuan, he was convicted of cursing the emperor and should have been executed.

cells.content: 易侯僕蕲
cells.literal: Yi Marquis Pu Qi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Yi: Pu Qi

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯，千一百十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis, thousand one hundred ten households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis with 1110 households.

cells.content: 十二月丁丑封，六年，後三年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Twelfth month dingchou day enfeoffed, six years, after third year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingchou day of the twelfth month. After six years, in the after third year, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 范陽靖侯范代
cells.literal: Fan Yang Jing Marquis Fan Dai
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Jing of Fan Yang: Fan Dai

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯，六千二百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis, six thousand two hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis with 6200 households.

cells.content: 十二月丁丑封，十四年薨。
cells.literal: Twelfth month dingchou day enfeoffed, fourteen years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingchou day of the twelfth month, died after fourteen years.

cells.content: 元光二年，懷侯德嗣，四年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Yuanguang second year, Huai Marquis De succeeded, four years died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of Yuanguang, Huai Marquis De succeeded him, died after four years with no heir.

cells.content: 涿郡元始二年，玄孫政詔賜爵關內侯。
cells.literal: Zhuo commandery Yuanshi second year, great-great-grandson Zheng imperial decree granted title Guan Nei Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: In the second year of Yuanshi, Zhuo commandery, his great-great-grandson Zheng was granted the title of Guan Nei Marquis by imperial decree.

cells.content: 翕侯邯鄲
cells.literal: Xi Marquis Han Dan
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xi: Han Dan

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 十二月丁丑封，六年，元光四年，坐行來不請長信，免。
cells.literal: Twelfth month dingchou day enfeoffed, six years, Yuanguang fourth year, convicted coming and going not reported to Changxin, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingchou day of the twelfth month. After six years, in the fourth year of Yuanguang, he was convicted of coming and going without reporting to Changxin, and was dismissed.

cells.content: 內黃
cells.literal: Nei Huang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Nei Huang

cells.content: 亞谷簡侯盧它之
cells.literal: Ya Gu Jian Marquis Lu Ta Zhi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Jian of Ya Gu: Lu Ta Zhi

cells.content: 以匈奴東胡王降侯，千戶。故燕王綰子。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu Donghu king surrendered marquis, thousand households. Former Yan king Wan son.
cells.idiomatic: As a Donghu king of the Xiongnu who surrendered, he was made marquis with 1000 households. He was the son of the former Yan king Wan.

cells.content: 中五年四月丁巳封，二年薨。
cells.literal: Middle fifth year fourth month dingsi day enfeoffed, two years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingsi day of the fourth month in the middle fifth year, died after two years.

cells.content: 後元年，侯種嗣，七年薨。
cells.literal: After first year, Marquis Zhong succeeded, seven years died.
cells.idiomatic: In the first year after, Marquis Zhong succeeded him, and died after seven years.

cells.content: 建元五年，康侯漏嗣，七年薨。
cells.literal: Jianyuan fifth year, Kang Marquis Lou succeeded, seven years died.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth year of Jianyuan, Kang Marquis Lou succeeded him, and died after seven years.

cells.content: 元光六年，侯賀嗣，三十九年，延和二年，坐受衛太子節，掠死。
cells.literal: Yuanguang sixth year, Marquis He succeeded, thirty-nine years, Yanhe second year, convicted received Wei crown prince seal, beaten to death.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth year of Yuanguang, Marquis He succeeded him. After thirty-nine years, in the second year of Yanhe, he was convicted of receiving the Wei crown prince's seal and beaten to death.

cells.content: 塞侯直不疑
cells.literal: Sai Marquis Zhi Bu Yi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Sai: Zhi Bu Yi

cells.content: 以御史大夫侯，前有將兵擊吳楚功。
cells.literal: As Grandee Secretary marquis, previously had merit of leading troops to attack Wu Chu.
cells.idiomatic: As Grandee Secretary, he was made marquis. He previously had merit for leading troops to attack Wu and Chu.

cells.content: 後元年八月封，六年薨。
cells.literal: After first year eighth month enfeoffed, six years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the eighth month of the after first year, died after six years.

cells.content: 建元四年，康侯相如嗣，十二年薨。
cells.literal: Jianyuan fourth year, Kang Marquis Xiangru succeeded, twelve years died.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Jianyuan, Kang Marquis Xiangru succeeded him, and died after twelve years.

cells.content: 元朔四年，侯堅嗣，十三年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuanshuo fourth year, Marquis Jian succeeded, thirteen years, Yuanding fifth year, convicted tribute wine light dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuanshuo, Marquis Jian succeeded him. After thirteen years, in the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of light tribute wine and dismissed.

translations.idiomatic: Above, eighteen marquises from Xiaojing's reign.

sentences.zh: 平陸、休、沈猷、紅、宛朐、棘樂、乘氏、桓邑八人在王子，魏其、蓋二人在外戚，隆慮一人隨父，凡二十九人。

translations.literal: Pinglu, Xiu, Shen You, Hong, Wan Qu, Ji Le, Cheng Shi, Huan Yi eight in imperial princes, Weiqi, Gai two in maternal relatives, Long Lu one followed father, total twenty-nine people.
translations.idiomatic: Pinglu, Xiu, Shen You, Hong, Wan Qu, Ji Le, Cheng Shi, and Huan Yi—eight were imperial princes. Weiqi and Gai—two were maternal relatives. Long Lu—one followed his father. Total twenty-nine people.

cells.content: 翕侯趙信
cells.literal: Xi Marquis Zhao Xin
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xi: Zhao Xin

cells.content: 以匈奴相國降侯，元朔二年擊匈奴功益封，千六百八十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu chancellor surrendered marquis, Yuanshuo second year attacked Xiongnu merit additional enfeoffment, thousand six hundred eighty households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu chancellor who surrendered, he was made marquis. In the second year of Yuanshuo, his merit for attacking the Xiongnu brought additional enfeoffment with 1680 households.

cells.content: 元光四年十月壬午封，六年，元朔六年，為右將軍擊匈奴，兵敗，降匈奴。
cells.literal: Yuanguang fourth year tenth month renwu day enfeoffed, six years, Yuanshuo sixth year, as right general attacked Xiongnu, army defeated, surrendered to Xiongnu.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renwu day of the tenth month in the fourth year of Yuanguang. After six years, in the sixth year of Yuanshuo, as Right General he attacked the Xiongnu, his army was defeated, and he surrendered to the Xiongnu.

cells.content: 內黃
cells.literal: Nei Huang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Nei Huang

cells.content: 特轅侯樂
cells.literal: Te Yuan Marquis Le
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Te Yuan: Le

cells.content: 以匈奴都尉降侯，六百五十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu captain surrendered marquis, six hundred fifty households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu captain who surrendered, he was made marquis with 650 households.

cells.content: 元朔元年後九月丙寅封，十三年，元鼎元年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Yuanshuo first year after ninth month bingyin day enfeoffed, thirteen years, Yuanding first year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the bingyin day of the ninth month after the first year of Yuanshuo. After thirteen years, in the first year of Yuanding, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 南陽
cells.literal: Nan Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Nan Yang

cells.content: ���陽侯月氏
cells.literal: Huai Yang Marquis Yue Zhi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Huai Yang: Yue Zhi

cells.content: 以匈奴相降侯，六百八十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu chancellor surrendered marquis, six hundred eighty households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu chancellor who surrendered, he was made marquis with 680 households.

cells.content: 元朔二年十月癸巳封，五年，坐謀反入匈奴，要斬。
cells.literal: Yuanshuo second year tenth month guisi day enfeoffed, five years, convicted plotting rebellion entered Xiongnu, should be executed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guisi day of the tenth month in the second year of Yuanshuo. After five years, he was convicted of plotting rebellion and entering the Xiongnu, and should have been executed.

cells.content: 舞陽
cells.literal: Wu Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Wu Yang

cells.content: 若陽侯猛
cells.literal: Ruo Yang Marquis Meng
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ruo Yang: Meng

cells.content: 以匈奴相降侯，五百三十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu chancellor surrendered marquis, five hundred thirty households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu chancellor who surrendered, he was made marquis with 530 households.

cells.content: 十月癸巳封，五年，坐謀反入匈奴，要斬。
cells.literal: Tenth month guisi day enfeoffed, five years, convicted plotting rebellion entered Xiongnu, should be executed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guisi day of the tenth month. After five years, he was convicted of plotting rebellion and entering the Xiongnu, and should have been executed.

cells.content: 平氏
cells.literal: Ping Shi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ping Shi

cells.content: 平陵侯蘇建
cells.literal: Ping Ling Marquis Su Jian
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ping Ling: Su Jian

cells.content: 以都尉從車騎將軍擊匈奴功侯，元朔五年，用游擊將軍從大將軍，益封，凡一千戶。
cells.literal: As captain followed chariot cavalry general attacked Xiongnu merit marquis, Yuanshuo fifth year, used as roaming general followed great general, additional enfeoffment, total thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As a captain who followed the Chariot Cavalry General and attacked the Xiongnu, he was made marquis for merit. In the fifth year of Yuanshuo, serving as Roaming General under the Great General, he received additional enfeoffment, totaling 1000 households.

cells.content: 三月丙辰封，六年，坐為前將軍與翕侯信俱敗，獨身脫來歸，當斬，贖罪，免。
cells.literal: Third month bingchen day enfeoffed, six years, convicted as former general with Xi marquis Xin both defeated, alone escaped returned, should be executed, redeemed crime, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the bingchen day of the third month. After six years, he was convicted as Former General for being defeated along with Xi Marquis Xin, but escaped alone and returned. He should have been executed, but redeemed his crime and was dismissed.

cells.content: 武當
cells.literal: Wu Dang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Wu Dang

cells.content: 岸頭侯張次公
cells.literal: An Tou Marquis Zhang Ci Gong
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of An Tou: Zhang Ci Gong

cells.content: 以都尉從車騎將軍擊匈奴侯，從大將軍，益封，凡二千戶。
cells.literal: As captain followed chariot cavalry general attacked Xiongnu marquis, followed great general, additional enfeoffment, total two thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As a captain who followed the Chariot Cavalry General and attacked the Xiongnu, he was made marquis. He followed the Great General and received additional enfeoffment, totaling 2000 households.

cells.content: 五月己巳封，五年，元狩元年，坐與淮南王女陵姦，受財物，免。
cells.literal: Fifth month jisi day enfeoffed, five years, Yuanhun first year, convicted with Huainan king daughter Ling adultery, received valuables, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the jisi day of the fifth month. After five years, in the first year of Yuanhun, he was convicted of adultery with Huainan King Ling's daughter and receiving valuables, and was dismissed.

cells.content: 皮氏
cells.literal: Pi Shi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Pi Shi

cells.content: 涉安侯於單
cells.literal: She An Marquis Yu Shan
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of She An: Yu Shan

cells.content: 以匈奴單于太子降侯。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu chanyu crown prince surrendered marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As the Xiongnu Chanyu's crown prince who surrendered, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 三年四月丙子封，五月薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Third year fourth month bingzi day enfeoffed, five months died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the bingzi day of the fourth month in the third year, died after five months with no heir.

cells.content: 昌武侯趙安稽
cells.literal: Chang Wu Marquis Zhao An Ji
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Chang Wu: Zhao An Ji

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯，以昌武侯從驃騎將軍擊左王，益封。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis, as Chang Wu marquis followed flying cavalry general attacked left king, additional enfeoffment.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis. As Chang Wu Marquis, he followed the Flying Cavalry General and attacked the Left King, receiving additional enfeoffment.

cells.content: 四年七月庚申封，二十一年薨。
cells.literal: Fourth year seventh month gengshen day enfeoffed, twenty-one years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the gengshen day of the seventh month in the fourth year, died after twenty-one years.

cells.content: 太初元年，侯充國嗣，四年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Taichu first year, Marquis Chong Guo succeeded, four years died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: In the first year of Taichu, Marquis Chong Guo succeeded him, died after four years with no heir.

cells.content: 舞陽
cells.literal: Wu Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Wu Yang

cells.content: 襄城侯桀龍
cells.literal: Xiang Cheng Marquis Jie Long
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xiang Cheng: Jie Long

cells.content: 以匈奴相國降侯，四百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu chancellor surrendered marquis, four hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu chancellor who surrendered, he was made marquis with 400 households.

cells.content: 七月庚申封，三十二年，與浞野侯俱戰死事。
cells.literal: Seventh month gengshen day enfeoffed, thirty-two years, together with Zhe Ye marquis both died in battle service.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the gengshen day of the seventh month. After thirty-two years, he died in battle along with Zhe Ye Marquis.

cells.content: 太初三年，侯病已嗣，十五年，後二年，坐祝詛上，下獄瘐死。
cells.literal: Taichu third year, Marquis Bing Yi succeeded, fifteen years, after second year, convicted cursed emperor, imprisoned starved to death.
cells.idiomatic: In the third year of Taichu, Marquis Bing Yi succeeded him. After fifteen years, in the after second year, he was convicted of cursing the emperor and imprisoned until he starved to death.

cells.content: 襄垣
cells.literal: Xiang Yuan
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xiang Yuan

cells.content: 安樂侯李蔡
cells.literal: An Le Marquis Li Cai
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of An Le: Li Cai

cells.content: 以將軍再擊匈奴得王，侯，二千戶。
cells.literal: As general twice attacked Xiongnu captured king, marquis, two thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As a general who twice attacked the Xiongnu and captured a king, he was made marquis with 2000 households.

cells.content: 四月乙巳封，六年，元狩五年，坐以丞相侵賣園陵道壖地，自殺。
cells.literal: Fourth month yisi day enfeoffed, six years, Yuanhun fifth year, convicted as chancellor encroached sold garden tomb road border land, committed suicide.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yisi day of the fourth month. After six years, in the fifth year of Yuanhun, he was convicted as Chancellor for encroaching on and selling land bordering the garden tomb road, and committed suicide.

cells.content: 昌
cells.literal: Chang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Chang

cells.content: 合騎侯公孫敖
cells.literal: He Qi Marquis Gongsun Ao
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of He Qi: Gongsun Ao

cells.content: 以護軍都尉三從大將軍擊匈奴，至右王庭得王侯，元朔六年，從大將軍，益封，九千五百戶。
cells.literal: As Protector General captain three times followed great general attacked Xiongnu, reached right king court captured king marquis, Yuanshuo sixth year, followed great general, additional enfeoffment, nine thousand five hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As Protector General captain who three times followed the Great General to attack the Xiongnu and reached the Right King's court where he captured a king, he was made marquis. In the sixth year of Yuanshuo, following the Great General, he received additional enfeoffment, totaling 9500 households.

cells.content: 以五年四月丁未封，至元狩二年坐將兵擊匈奴與票騎將軍期後，畏懦當斬，贖罪。
cells.literal: As fifth year fourth month dingwei day enfeoffed, to Yuanhun second year convicted led troops attacked Xiongnu missed appointment with Flying Cavalry General, cowardice should be executed, redeemed crime.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingwei day of the fourth month in the fifth year. By the second year of Yuanhun, he was convicted of leading troops to attack the Xiongnu but missing the appointment with the Flying Cavalry General due to cowardice. He should have been executed but redeemed his crime.

cells.content: 高城
cells.literal: Gao Cheng
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Gao Cheng

cells.content: 軹侯李朔
cells.literal: Zhi Marquis Li Shuo
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Zhi: Li Shuo

cells.content: 以校尉三從大將軍擊匈奴，至右王庭得虜閼氏功侯。
cells.literal: As colonel three times followed great general attacked Xiongnu, reached right king court captured captive Yanzhi merit marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a colonel who three times followed the Great General to attack the Xiongnu and reached the Right King's court where he captured the captive Yanzhi, he was made marquis for merit.

cells.content: 四月乙卯封，六年，有罪，當免。
cells.literal: Fourth month yimao day enfeoffed, six years, had crime, should be dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yimao day of the fourth month. After six years, he committed a crime and should have been dismissed.

cells.content: 西安
cells.literal: Xi An
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xi An

cells.content: 從平侯公孫戎奴
cells.literal: Cong Ping Marquis Gongsun Rong Nu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Cong Ping: Gongsun Rong Nu

cells.content: 以校尉三從大將軍擊匈奴，至右王庭為鴈行上石山先登，侯，一千一百戶。
cells.literal: As colonel three times followed great general attacked Xiongnu, reached right king court formed goose line ascended stone mountain first ascended, marquis, one thousand one hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a colonel who three times followed the Great General to attack the Xiongnu and reached the Right King's court where he formed a goose line and ascended Stone Mountain first, he was made marquis with 1100 households.

cells.content: 四月乙卯封，三年，元狩二年，坐為上黨太守發兵擊匈奴不以聞，免。
cells.literal: Fourth month yimao day enfeoffed, three years, Yuanhun second year, convicted as Shangdang governor raised troops attacked Xiongnu not reported, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yimao day of the fourth month. After three years, in the second year of Yuanhun, he was convicted as governor of Shangdang for raising troops to attack the Xiongnu without reporting it, and was dismissed.

cells.content: 樂昌
cells.literal: Le Chang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Le Chang

cells.content: 隨城侯趙不虞
cells.literal: Sui Cheng Marquis Zhao Bu Yu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Sui Cheng: Zhao Bu Yu

cells.content: 以校尉三從大將軍擊匈奴，攻辰吾先登石亹，侯，七百戶。
cells.literal: As colonel three times followed great general attacked Xiongnu, attacked Chen Wu first ascended stone gorge, marquis, seven hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a colonel who three times followed the Great General to attack the Xiongnu and attacked Chen Wu, ascending the stone gorge first, he was made marquis with 700 households.

cells.content: 四月乙卯封，三年，元狩二年，坐為定襄都尉，匈奴敗，太守以聞非實，謾，免。
cells.literal: Fourth month yimao day enfeoffed, three years, Yuanhun second year, convicted as Dingxiang colonel, Xiongnu defeated, governor reported not true, deceived, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yimao day of the fourth month. After three years, in the second year of Yuanhun, he was convicted as colonel of Dingxiang for deceiving others: the Xiongnu were defeated, but the governor reported it as not true.

cells.content: 千乘
cells.literal: Qian Cheng
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Qian Cheng

cells.content: 博望侯張騫
cells.literal: Bo Wang Marquis Zhang Qian
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Bo Wang: Zhang Qian

cells.content: 以校尉數從大將軍擊匈奴，知道水，及前使絕國大夏，侯。
cells.literal: As colonel several times followed great general attacked Xiongnu, knew water route, and previously envoy to distant country Daxia, marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a colonel who several times followed the Great General to attack the Xiongnu and knew the water route, and previously served as envoy to the distant country of Daxia, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 六年三月甲辰封，元狩二年，坐以將軍擊匈奴畏懦，當斬，贖罪，免。
cells.literal: Sixth year third month jiachen day enfeoffed, Yuanhun second year, convicted as general attacked Xiongnu cowardice, should be executed, redeemed crime, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the jiachen day of the third month in the sixth year. In the second year of Yuanhun, he was convicted as general for cowardice when attacking the Xiongnu. He should have been executed but redeemed his crime and was dismissed.

cells.content: 眾利侯郝賢
cells.literal: Zhong Li Marquis Hao Xian
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Zhong Li: Hao Xian

cells.content: 以上谷太守四從大將軍擊匈奴，首虜千級以上，侯，千一百戶。
cells.literal: As Shanggu governor four times followed great general attacked Xiongnu, decapitated captives thousand levels above, marquis, one thousand one hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As governor of Shanggu who four times followed the Great General to attack the Xiongnu and decapitated more than a thousand captives, he was made marquis with 1100 households.

cells.content: 五月壬辰封，二年，元狩二年，坐為上谷太守入戍卒財物，上計謾，免。
cells.literal: Fifth month renchen day enfeoffed, two years, Yuanhun second year, convicted as Shanggu governor entered garrison soldiers property, upper accounting deceived, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renchen day of the fifth month. After two years, in the second year of Yuanhun, he was convicted as governor of Shanggu for embezzling garrison soldiers' property and deceiving in the upper accounting, and was dismissed.

cells.content: 姑莫
cells.literal: Gu Mo
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Gu Mo

cells.content: 潦悼侯王援訾
cells.literal: Lao Dao Marquis Wang Yuan Zi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Lao Dao: Wang Yuan Zi

cells.content: 以匈奴趙王降侯，五百六十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu Zhao king surrendered marquis, five hundred sixty households.
cells.idiomatic: As the Xiongnu Zhao king who surrendered, he was made marquis with 560 households.

cells.content: 元狩元年七月壬午封，二年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Yuanhun first year seventh month renwu day enfeoffed, two years died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renwu day of the seventh month in the first year of Yuanhun, died after two years with no heir.

cells.content: 舞陽
cells.literal: Wu Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Wu Yang

cells.content: 從票侯趙破奴
cells.literal: Cong Piao Marquis Zhao Po Nu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Cong Piao: Zhao Po Nu

cells.content: 以司馬再從票騎將軍擊匈奴，得兩王子騎將侯，二千戶。
cells.literal: As assistant twice followed flying cavalry general attacked Xiongnu, obtained two princes cavalry general marquis, two thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As an assistant who twice followed the Flying Cavalry General to attack the Xiongnu and captured two princes, he was made Cavalry General Marquis with 2000 households.

cells.content: 二年五月丙戌封，九年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。元封三年，以匈河將軍擊樓蘭，封浞野侯。五年，太初二年，以浚稽將軍擊匈奴，為虜所獲，軍沒。
cells.literal: Second year fifth month bingxu day enfeoffed, nine years, Yuanding fifth year, convicted tribute wine light dismissed. Yuanfeng third year, as Hunhe general attacked Loulan, enfeoffed Zhe Ye marquis. Fifth year, Taichu second year, as Junji general attacked Xiongnu, captured by captives, army lost.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the bingxu day of the fifth month in the second year. After nine years, in the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of light tribute wine and dismissed. In the third year of Yuanfeng, as Hunhe General he attacked Loulan and was enfeoffed as Zhe Ye Marquis. After five years, in the second year of Taichu, as Junji General he attacked the Xiongnu but was captured by the enemy, and his army was lost.

cells.content: 宜冠侯高不識
cells.literal: Yi Guan Marquis Gao Bu Shi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Yi Guan: Gao Bu Shi

cells.content: 以校尉從票騎將軍再擊匈奴。侯，一千一百戶。故匈奴歸義。
cells.literal: As colonel followed flying cavalry general twice attacked Xiongnu. Marquis, one thousand one hundred households. Former Xiongnu submitted to righteousness.
cells.idiomatic: As a colonel who twice followed the Flying Cavalry General to attack the Xiongnu, he was made marquis with 1100 households. He was formerly a Xiongnu who submitted to righteousness.

cells.content: 五月庚戌封，四年坐擊匈奴增首不以實，當斬，贖罪，免。
cells.literal: Fifth month gengxu day enfeoffed, four years convicted attacked Xiongnu increased decapitations not true, should be executed, redeemed crime, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the gengxu day of the fifth month. After four years, he was convicted of falsely reporting increased decapitations when attacking the Xiongnu. He should have been executed but redeemed his crime and was dismissed.

cells.content: 昌
cells.literal: Chang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Chang

cells.content: 煇渠忠侯僕朋
cells.literal: Hui Qu Zhong Marquis Pu Peng
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Hui Qu Zhong: Pu Peng

cells.content: 以校尉從票騎將軍再出擊匈奴得王，侯，從票騎將軍虜五王，益封。故匈奴歸義。
cells.literal: As colonel followed flying cavalry general twice went out attacked Xiongnu captured king, marquis, followed flying cavalry general captured five kings, additional enfeoffment. Former Xiongnu submitted to righteousness.
cells.idiomatic: As a colonel who twice went out following the Flying Cavalry General and attacked the Xiongnu, capturing a king, he was made marquis. Following the Flying Cavalry General, he captured five kings and received additional enfeoffment. He was formerly a Xiongnu who submitted to righteousness.

cells.content: 二年二月乙丑封，八年薨。
cells.literal: Second year second month yichou day enfeoffed, eight years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yichou day of the second month in the second year, died after eight years.

cells.content: 元鼎四年，侯雷電嗣，二十二年，延和三年，以五原屬國都尉與貳師將軍俱擊匈奴，沒。
cells.literal: Yuanding fourth year, Marquis Lei Dian succeeded, twenty-two years, Yanhe third year, as Wuyuan subordinate state colonel together with Er Shi general both attacked Xiongnu, lost.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuanding, Marquis Lei Dian succeeded him. After twenty-two years, in the third year of Yanhe, as colonel of the Wuyuan subordinate state he attacked the Xiongnu along with Er Shi General, and was lost.

cells.content: 魯陽
cells.literal: Lu Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Lu Yang

cells.content: 下摩侯謼毒尼
cells.literal: Xia Mo Marquis Ku Du Ni
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xia Mo: Ku Du Ni

cells.content: 以匈奴王降封，七百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered enfeoffed, seven hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was enfeoffed with 700 households.

cells.content: 六月乙亥封，九年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth month yihai day enfeoffed, nine years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yihai day of the sixth month, died after nine years.

cells.content: 元鼎五年，煬侯伊即軒嗣。
cells.literal: Yuanding fifth year, Yang Marquis Yi Ji Xuan succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth year of Yuanding, Yang Marquis Yi Ji Xuan succeeded him.

cells.content: 侯冠支嗣，神爵三年，詔居弋居山，坐將家屬闌入惡師居，免。
cells.literal: Marquis Guan Zhi succeeded, Shenjue third year, imperial decree lived Yi Ju mountain, convicted led family illegally entered E Shi residence, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Guan Zhi succeeded him. In the third year of Shenjue, by imperial decree he lived on Yi Ju Mountain. He was convicted of leading his family in illegally entering the E Shi residence, and was dismissed.

cells.content: 猗氏
cells.literal: Yi Shi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Yi Shi

cells.content: 濕陰定侯昆邪
cells.literal: Shi Yin Ding Marquis Kun Xie
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Ding of Shi Yin: Kun Xie

cells.content: 以匈奴昆邪王將眾十萬降侯，萬戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu Kun Xie king led multitude one hundred thousand surrendered marquis, ten thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As the Xiongnu Kun Xie king who led 100,000 of his people in surrender, he was made marquis with 10,000 households.

cells.content: 三年七月壬午封，四月薨。
cells.literal: Third year seventh month renwu day enfeoffed, four months died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renwu day of the seventh month in the third year, died after four months.

cells.content: 元鼎元年，魏侯蘇嗣，十年，元封五年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Yuanding first year, Wei Marquis Su succeeded, ten years, Yuanfeng fifth year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: In the first year of Yuanding, Wei Marquis Su succeeded him. After ten years, in the fifth year of Yuanfeng, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 平原
cells.literal: Ping Yuan
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ping Yuan

cells.content: 煇渠慎侯應疕
cells.literal: Hui Qu Shen Marquis Ying Chi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Shen of Hui Qu: Ying Chi

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 七月壬午封，五年，元鼎三年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Seventh month renwu day enfeoffed, five years, Yuanding third year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renwu day of the seventh month. After five years, in the third year of Yuanding, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 魯陽
cells.literal: Lu Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Lu Yang

cells.content: 河綦康侯烏黎
cells.literal: He Qi Kang Marquis Wu Li
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Kang of He Qi: Wu Li

cells.content: 以匈奴右王與渾邪降侯，六百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu right king with Hun Xie surrendered marquis, six hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As the Xiongnu right king who surrendered with Hun Xie, he was made marquis with 600 households.

cells.content: 七月壬午封，六年薨。
cells.literal: Seventh month renwu day enfeoffed, six years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renwu day of the seventh month, died after six years.

cells.content: 元鼎三年，侯餘利鞮嗣，四十二年，本始二年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Yuanding third year, Marquis Yu Li Di succeeded, forty-two years, Benshi second year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: In the third year of Yuanding, Marquis Yu Li Di succeeded him. After forty-two years, in the second year of Benshi, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 濟南
cells.literal: Ji Nan
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ji Nan

cells.content: 常樂侯稠雕
cells.literal: Chang Le Marquis Chou Diao
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Chang Le: Chou Diao

cells.content: 以匈奴大當戶與渾邪降侯，五百七十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu great dang hu with Hun Xie surrendered marquis, five hundred seventy households.
cells.idiomatic: As the Xiongnu great dang hu who surrendered with Hun Xie, he was made marquis with 570 households.

cells.content: 七月壬午封，十八年薨。
cells.literal: Seventh month renwu day enfeoffed, eighteen years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renwu day of the seventh month, died after eighteen years.

cells.content: 太初三年，侯廣漢嗣，六年，太始元年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Taichu third year, Marquis Guang Han succeeded, six years, Taishi first year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: In the third year of Taichu, Marquis Guang Han succeeded him. After six years, in the first year of Taishi, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 濟南
cells.literal: Ji Nan
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ji Nan

cells.content: 邳離侯路博德
cells.literal: Pi Li Marquis Lu Bo De
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Pi Li: Lu Bo De

cells.content: 以右北平太守從票騎將軍擊左王，得重，會期，虜首萬二千七百人，侯，千六百戶。
cells.literal: As Youbeiping governor followed flying cavalry general attacked left king, obtained importance, met deadline, captive heads twelve thousand seven hundred people, marquis, one thousand six hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As governor of Youbeiping who followed the Flying Cavalry General to attack the left king, achieved importance, met the deadline, and took 12,700 captive heads, he was made marquis with 1600 households.

cells.content: 四年六月丁卯封，十五年，太初元年，坐見知子犯逆不道罪免。
cells.literal: Fourth year sixth month dingmao day enfeoffed, fifteen years, Taichu first year, convicted aware son committed rebellious unprincipled crime dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingmao day of the sixth month in the fourth year. After fifteen years, in the first year of Taichu, he was convicted of being aware that his son committed rebellious and unprincipled crimes, and was dismissed.

cells.content: 朱虛
cells.literal: Zhu Xu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Zhu Xu

cells.content: 義陽侯衛山
cells.literal: Yi Yang Marquis Wei Shan
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Yi Yang: Wei Shan

cells.content: 以北地都尉從票騎將軍擊匈奴得王，侯，千一百戶。
cells.literal: As Beidi colonel followed flying cavalry general attacked Xiongnu captured king, marquis, one thousand one hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As Beidi colonel who followed the Flying Cavalry General to attack the Xiongnu and captured a king, he was made marquis with 1100 households.

cells.content: 六月丁卯封，二十六年，太始四年，坐教人誑告眾利侯當時棄市罪，獄未斷病死。
cells.literal: Sixth month dingmao day enfeoffed, twenty-six years, Taishi fourth year, convicted taught people falsely accused Zhongli marquis Dangshi executed crime, prison not concluded died of illness.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingmao day of the sixth month. After twenty-six years, in the fourth year of Taishi, he was convicted of teaching people to falsely accuse Zhongli Marquis Dangshi of a capital crime. The case was not concluded when he died of illness.

cells.content: 平氏
cells.literal: Ping Shi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ping Shi

cells.content: 杜侯復陸支
cells.literal: Du Marquis Fu Lu Zhi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Du: Fu Lu Zhi

cells.content: 以匈奴歸義因孰王從票騎將軍擊左王，以少破多，捕虜三千一百，侯，千三百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu submitted righteousness Yin Shu king followed flying cavalry general attacked left king, with few broke many, captured captives three thousand one hundred, marquis, one thousand three hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As the Xiongnu submitted righteousness Yin Shu king who followed the Flying Cavalry General to attack the left king, broke the many with few, and captured 3100 captives, he was made marquis with 1300 households.

cells.content: 六月丁卯封，五年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth month dingmao day enfeoffed, five years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingmao day of the sixth month, died after five years.

cells.content: 元鼎三年，侯偃嗣。
cells.literal: Yuanding third year, Marquis Yan succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: In the third year of Yuanding, Marquis Yan succeeded him.

cells.content: 侯屠耆嗣。
cells.literal: Marquis Tu Qi succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Tu Qi succeeded him.

cells.content: 侯宣平嗣。
cells.literal: Marquis Xuan Ping succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Xuan Ping succeeded him.

cells.content: 重平侯福嗣，河平四年，坐非子免。
cells.literal: Chongping marquis Fu succeeded, Heping fourth year, convicted not son dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Chongping Marquis Fu succeeded him. In the fourth year of Heping, he was convicted of not being the proper son and dismissed.

cells.content: 眾利侯伊即軒
cells.literal: Zhong Li Marquis Yi Ji Xuan
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Zhong Li: Yi Ji Xuan

cells.content: 以匈奴歸義樓剸王從票騎將軍擊左王，手劍合，侯，千一百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu submitted righteousness Lou Chan king followed flying cavalry general attacked left king, hand sword joined, marquis, one thousand one hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As the Xiongnu submitted righteousness Lou Chan king who followed the Flying Cavalry General to attack the left king and fought hand-to-hand with swords, he was made marquis with 1100 households.

cells.content: 六月丁卯封，十四年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth month dingmao day enfeoffed, fourteen years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingmao day of the sixth month, died after fourteen years.

cells.content: 元封六年，侯當時嗣。
cells.literal: Yuanfeng sixth year, Marquis Dangshi succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: In the sixth year of Yuanfeng, Marquis Dangshi succeeded him.

cells.content: 侯輔宗嗣，始元五年薨，亡後，為諸縣。
cells.literal: Marquis Fu Zong succeeded, Shiyuan fifth year died, no heir, became various counties.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Fu Zong succeeded him. In the fifth year of Shiyuan, he died with no heir, and the fief became various counties.

cells.content: 湘成侯敞屠洛
cells.literal: Xiang Cheng Marquis Chang Tu Luo
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xiang Cheng: Chang Tu Luo

cells.content: 以匈奴符離王降侯，千八百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu Fu Li king surrendered marquis, one thousand eight hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As the Xiongnu Fu Li king who surrendered, he was made marquis with 1800 households.

cells.content: 六月丙子封，七年，元鼎五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Sixth month bingzi day enfeoffed, seven years, Yuanding fifth year, convicted tribute wine light dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the bingzi day of the sixth month. After seven years, in the fifth year of Yuanding, he was convicted of light tribute wine and dismissed.

cells.content: 陽成
cells.literal: Yang Cheng
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Yang Cheng

cells.content: 散侯董舍吾
cells.literal: San Marquis Dong She Wu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of San: Dong She Wu

cells.content: 以匈奴都尉降侯，千一百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu colonel surrendered marquis, one thousand one hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu colonel who surrendered, he was made marquis with 1100 households.

cells.content: 六月丙子封，十七年薨。
cells.literal: Sixth month bingzi day enfeoffed, seventeen years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the bingzi day of the sixth month, died after seventeen years.

cells.content: 太初三年，侯安漢嗣。
cells.literal: Taichu third year, Marquis An Han succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: In the third year of Taichu, Marquis An Han succeeded him.

cells.content: 侯賢嗣，征和三年，坐祝詛上，下獄病死。
cells.literal: Marquis Xian succeeded, Zhenghe third year, convicted cursed emperor, imprisoned died of illness.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Xian succeeded him. In the third year of Zhenghe, he was convicted of cursing the emperor and imprisoned until he died of illness.

cells.content: 陽成
cells.literal: Yang Cheng
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Yang Cheng

cells.content: 臧馬康侯雕延年
cells.literal: Zang Ma Kang Marquis Diao Yan Nian
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Kang of Zang Ma: Diao Yan Nian

cells.content: 以匈奴王降侯，八百七十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu king surrendered marquis, eight hundred seventy households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Xiongnu king who surrendered, he was made marquis with 870 households.

cells.content: 六月丙子封，五年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Sixth month bingzi day enfeoffed, five years died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the bingzi day of the sixth month, died after five years with no heir.

cells.content: 朱虛
cells.literal: Zhu Xu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Zhu Xu

cells.content: 瞭侯次公
cells.literal: Liao Marquis Ci Gong
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Liao: Ci Gong

cells.content: 以匈奴歸義王降侯，七百九十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiongnu submitted righteousness king surrendered marquis, seven hundred ninety households.
cells.idiomatic: As the Xiongnu submitted righteousness king who surrendered, he was made marquis with 790 households.

cells.content: 元鼎四年六月丙午封，五年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Yuanding fourth year sixth month bingwu day enfeoffed, five years, convicted tribute wine light dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the bingwu day of the sixth month in the fourth year of Yuanding. After five years, he was convicted of light tribute wine and dismissed.

cells.content: 舞陽
cells.literal: Wu Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Wu Yang

cells.content: 術陽侯建德
cells.literal: Shu Yang Marquis Jian De
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Shu Yang: Jian De

cells.content: 以南越王兄越高昌侯侯，三千戶。
cells.literal: As Nanyue king elder brother Gao Chang Hou marquis, three thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As the elder brother of the Nanyue king, he was made Gao Chang Hou Marquis with 3000 households.

cells.content: 五年三月千午封，四年，坐使南海逆不道，誅。
cells.literal: Fifth year third month qianwu day enfeoffed, four years, convicted sent to Nanhai rebellious unprincipled, executed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the qianwu day of the third month in the fifth year. After four years, he was convicted of sending emissaries to Nanhai for rebellious and unprincipled purposes, and executed.

cells.content: 下邳
cells.literal: Xia Pi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xia Pi

cells.content: 龍侯摎廣德
cells.literal: Long Marquis Liu Guang De
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Long: Liu Guang De

cells.content: 父樂以校尉擊南越死事，子侯，六百七十戶。
cells.literal: Father Le as colonel attacked Nanyue died in service, son marquis, six hundred seventy households.
cells.idiomatic: His father Le, as a colonel who attacked Nanyue and died in service, had his son made marquis with 670 households.

cells.content: 三月壬午封，六年，坐酎金免。
cells.literal: Third month renwu day enfeoffed, six years, convicted tribute wine light dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renwu day of the third month. After six years, he was convicted of light tribute wine and dismissed.

cells.content: 成安侯韓延年
cells.literal: Cheng An Marquis Han Yan Nian
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Cheng An: Han Yan Nian

cells.content: 父千秋以校尉擊南越死事，子侯，千三百八十戶。
cells.literal: Father Qian Qiu as colonel attacked Nanyue died in service, son marquis, one thousand three hundred eighty households.
cells.idiomatic: His father Qian Qiu, as a colonel who attacked Nanyue and died in service, had his son made marquis with 1380 households.

cells.content: 三月壬午封，七年，元封六年，坐為太常行大行令事留外國書一月，乏興，入穀贖，完為城旦。
cells.literal: Third month renwu day enfeoffed, seven years, Yuanfeng sixth year, convicted as Grand Master of Ceremonies acting as Grand Herald kept foreign country letter one month, insufficient protocol, entered grain redeemed, completed as Cheng Dan.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renwu day of the third month. After seven years, in the sixth year of Yuanfeng, he was convicted as Grand Master of Ceremonies for acting as Grand Herald and keeping a foreign country's letter for one month without sufficient protocol. He entered grain to redeem his crime and completed his sentence as a Cheng Dan.

cells.content: 郟
cells.literal: Jia
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Jia

cells.content: 昆侯渠復絫
cells.literal: Kun Marquis Qu Fu Chen
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Kun: Qu Fu Chen

cells.content: 以屬國大首渠擊匈奴侯。
cells.literal: As subordinate state great chief attacked Xiongnu marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As a great chief of the subordinate state who attacked the Xiongnu, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 五月戊戌封。
cells.literal: Fifth month wuxu day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the wuxu day of the fifth month.

cells.content: 侯乃始嗣，地節四年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Marquis Nai Shi succeeded, Dijie fourth year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Nai Shi succeeded him. In the fourth year of Dijie, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 鉅鹿
cells.literal: Ju Lu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ju Lu

cells.content: 騏侯駒幾
cells.literal: Qi Marquis Ju Ji
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Qi: Ju Ji

cells.content: 以屬國騎擊匈奴捕單于兄侯，五百二十戶。
cells.literal: As subordinate state cavalry attacked Xiongnu captured Chanyu brother marquis, five hundred twenty households.
cells.idiomatic: As subordinate state cavalry who attacked the Xiongnu and captured the Chanyu's brother, he was made marquis with 520 households.

cells.content: 五月壬子封。
cells.literal: Fifth month renzi day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renzi day of the fifth month.

cells.content: 侯督嗣。
cells.literal: Marquis Du succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Du succeeded him.

cells.content: 釐侯崇嗣，陽朔二年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Li marquis Chong succeeded, Yangshuo second year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Li Marquis Chong succeeded him. In the second year of Yangshuo, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 北屈
cells.literal: Bei Qu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Bei Qu

cells.content: 梁期侯任破胡
cells.literal: Liang Qi Marquis Ren Po Hu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Liang Qi: Ren Po Hu

cells.content: 以屬國都尉間出擊匈奴將軍絫絺縵等侯。
cells.literal: As subordinate state colonel secretly went out attacked Xiongnu generals Chen Chi Man etc. marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As subordinate state colonel who secretly went out and attacked Xiongnu generals Chen Chi Man and others, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 五月辛巳封。
cells.literal: Fifth month xinsi day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the xinsi day of the fifth month.

cells.content: 侯當千嗣，太始四年，坐賣馬一匹賈錢十五萬，過平，臧五百以上，免。
cells.literal: Marquis Dang Qian succeeded, Taishi fourth year, convicted sold horse one priced money fifteen thousand, over fair, concealed five hundred above, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Dang Qian succeeded him. In the fourth year of Taishi, he was convicted of selling one horse for 150,000 cash, which was over the fair price, concealing more than 500, and was dismissed.

cells.content: 膫侯畢取
cells.literal: Liao Marquis Bi Qu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Liao: Bi Qu

cells.content: 以南越將軍降侯，五百一十戶。
cells.literal: As Nanyue general surrendered marquis, five hundred ten households.
cells.idiomatic: As a Nanyue general who surrendered, he was made marquis with 510 households.

cells.content: 六年三月乙酉封。
cells.literal: Sixth year third month yiyou day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yiyou day of the third month in the sixth year.

cells.content: 侯奉義嗣，後二年，坐祝詛上，要斬。
cells.literal: Marquis Feng Yi succeeded, after second year, convicted cursed emperor, should be executed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Feng Yi succeeded him. In the after second year, he was convicted of cursing the emperor and should have been executed.

cells.content: 南陽
cells.literal: Nan Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Nan Yang

cells.content: 將梁侯楊僕
cells.literal: Jiang Liang Marquis Yang Pu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Jiang Liang: Yang Pu

cells.content: 以樓船將軍擊南越椎鋒卻敵侯。
cells.literal: As tower ship general attacked Nanyue hammer vanguard repelled enemy marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As Tower Ship General who attacked Nanyue, hammering the vanguard and repelling the enemy, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 三月乙酉封，四年，元封四年，坐為將軍擊朝鮮畏懦，入竹二萬箇，贖完為城旦。
cells.literal: Third month yiyou day enfeoffed, four years, Yuanfeng fourth year, convicted as general attacked Korea cowardice, entered bamboo twenty thousand pieces, redeemed completed as Cheng Dan.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yiyou day of the third month. After four years, in the fourth year of Yuanfeng, he was convicted as general for cowardice when attacking Korea. He entered 20,000 bamboo pieces to redeem his crime and completed his sentence as a Cheng Dan.

cells.content: 安道侯揭陽定
cells.literal: An Dao Marquis Jie Yang Ding
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of An Dao: Jie Yang Ding

cells.content: 以南越揭陽令聞漢兵至自定降，侯，六百戶。
cells.literal: As Nanyue Jie Yang magistrate heard Han troops arrived self-determined surrendered, marquis, six hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As Nanyue Jie Yang magistrate who heard Han troops were arriving and self-determined to surrender, he was made marquis with 600 households.

cells.content: 三月乙酉封。
cells.literal: Third month yiyou day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yiyou day of the third month.

cells.content: 侯當時嗣，延和四年，坐殺人，棄市。
cells.literal: Marquis Dangshi succeeded, Yanhe fourth year, convicted killed person, executed in market.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Dangshi succeeded him. In the fourth year of Yanhe, he was convicted of killing a person and executed in the market.

cells.content: 南陽
cells.literal: Nan Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Nan Yang

cells.content: 隨桃頃侯趙光
cells.literal: Sui Tao Qing Marquis Zhao Guang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Sui Tao Qing: Zhao Guang

cells.content: 以南越蒼梧王聞漢兵至，降，侯，三千戶。
cells.literal: As Nanyue Cangwu king heard Han troops arrived, surrendered, marquis, three thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As Nanyue Cangwu king who heard Han troops were arriving and surrendered, he was made marquis with 3000 households.

cells.content: 四月癸亥封，薨。
cells.literal: Fourth month guihai day enfeoffed, died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guihai day of the fourth month, died.

cells.content: 侯昌樂嗣，本始元年薨。嗣子有罪，不得代。
cells.literal: Marquis Chang Le succeeded, Benshi first year died. Successor son had crime, could not replace.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Chang Le succeeded him and died in the first year of Benshi. His successor son had committed a crime and could not replace him.

cells.content: 元始五年，放以光玄孫紹封，千戶。
cells.literal: Yuanshi fifth year, Fang as Guang great-great-grandson Shao enfeoffed, thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: In the fifth year of Yuanshi, Fang was enfeoffed as Shao, the great-great-grandson of Guang, with 1000 households.

cells.content: 湘成侯監居翁
cells.literal: Xiang Cheng Marquis Jian Ju Weng
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xiang Cheng: Jian Ju Weng

cells.content: 以南越桂林監聞漢兵破番禺，諭甌駱民四十餘萬降，侯，八百三十戶。
cells.literal: As Nanyue Guilin monitor heard Han troops broke Panyu, persuaded Ou Luo people over forty thousand surrendered, marquis, eight hundred thirty households.
cells.idiomatic: As Nanyue Guilin monitor who heard Han troops had broken Panyu and persuaded over 400,000 Ou Luo people to surrender, he was made marquis with 830 households.

cells.content: 五月壬申封。
cells.literal: Fifth month renshen day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renshen day of the fifth month.

cells.content: 侯益昌嗣，五鳳四年，坐為九真太守盜使人出買犀、奴婢，臧百萬以上，不道，誅。
cells.literal: Marquis Yi Chang succeeded, Wufeng fourth year, convicted as Jiuzhen governor stole sent people out bought rhinoceros, slave girls, concealed million above, unprincipled, executed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Yi Chang succeeded him. In the fourth year of Wufeng, he was convicted as governor of Jiuzhen for stealing and sending people out to buy rhinoceros horns and slave girls, concealing over a million in value. For this unprincipled behavior, he was executed.

cells.content: 堵陽
cells.literal: Du Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Du Yang

cells.content: 海常嚴侯蘇弘
cells.literal: Hai Chang Yan Marquis Su Hong
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Yan of Hai Chang: Su Hong

cells.content: 以伏波司馬得南越王建德侯。
cells.literal: As Fu Bo assistant obtained Nanyue king Jian De marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As Fu Bo assistant who captured Nanyue king Jian De, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 七月乙酉封，七年，太初元年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Seventh month yiyou day enfeoffed, seven years, Taichu first year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yiyou day of the seventh month. After seven years, in the first year of Taichu, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 外石侯吳陽
cells.literal: Wai Shi Marquis Wu Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Wai Shi: Wu Yang

cells.content: 以故東越衍侯佐繇王功侯，千戶。
cells.literal: As former Dongyue Yan Hou Zuo You king merit marquis, thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As former Dongyue Yan Hou Zuo You king who rendered meritorious service, he was made marquis with 1000 households.

cells.content: 元封元年正月壬午封，九年薨。
cells.literal: Yuanfeng first year first month renwu day enfeoffed, nine years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the renwu day of the first month in the first year of Yuanfeng, died after nine years.

cells.content: 太初四年，侯首嗣，十四年，後二年，坐祝詛上，要斬。
cells.literal: Taichu fourth year, Marquis Shou succeeded, fourteen years, after second year, convicted cursed emperor, should be executed.
cells.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Taichu, Marquis Shou succeeded him. After fourteen years, in the after second year, he was convicted of cursing the emperor and should have been executed.

cells.content: 濟陽
cells.literal: Ji Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ji Yang

cells.content: 下鄜侯左將黃同
cells.literal: Xia Fu Marquis Zuo Jiang Huang Tong
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Xia Fu: Zuo Jiang Huang Tong

cells.content: 以故甌駱左將斬西于王功侯，七百戶。
cells.literal: As former Ou Luo left general beheaded Xi Yu king merit marquis, seven hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As former Ou Luo left general who beheaded the Xi Yu king for meritorious service, he was made marquis with 700 households.

cells.content: 四月丁酉封。
cells.literal: Fourth month dingyou day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingyou day of the fourth month.

cells.content: 侯奉漢嗣，後二年，坐祝詛上，要斬。
cells.literal: Marquis Feng Han succeeded, after second year, convicted cursed emperor, should be executed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Feng Han succeeded him. In the after second year, he was convicted of cursing the emperor and should have been executed.

cells.content: 南陽
cells.literal: Nan Yang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Nan Yang

cells.content: 繚嫈侯劉福
cells.literal: Liao Nao Marquis Liu Fu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Liao Nao: Liu Fu

cells.content: 以校尉從橫海將軍擊南越侯。
cells.literal: As colonel followed Heng Hai general attacked Nanyue marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As colonel who followed the Heng Hai General to attack Nanyue, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 正月乙卯封，二年，有罪，免。
cells.literal: First month yimao day enfeoffed, two years, had crime, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yimao day of the first month. After two years, he committed a crime and was dismissed.

cells.content: 蓹兒嚴侯轅終古
cells.literal: Rong Er Yan Marquis Yuan Zhong Gu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Yan of Rong Er: Yuan Zhong Gu

cells.content: 以軍卒斬東越徇北將軍侯。
cells.literal: As army soldier beheaded Dongyue surrendered to north general marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As army soldier who beheaded Dongyue and surrendered to the north general, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 閏月癸卯封，六年，太初元年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Intercalary month guimao day enfeoffed, six years, Taichu first year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guimao day of the intercalary month. After six years, in the first year of Taichu, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 開陵侯建成
cells.literal: Kai Ling Marquis Jian Cheng
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Kai Ling: Jian Cheng

cells.content: 以故東粵建成侯與繇王斬餘善侯，二千戶。
cells.literal: As former Dongyue Jian Cheng Hou with You Wang beheaded Yu Shan Hou marquis, two thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As former Dongyue Jian Cheng Hou who with You Wang beheaded Yu Shan Hou, he was made marquis with 2000 households.

cells.content: 閏月癸卯封。
cells.literal: Intercalary month guimao day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guimao day of the intercalary month.

cells.content: 侯祿嗣，征和三年，坐舍衛太子所私幸女子，又祝詛上，要斬。
cells.literal: Marquis Lu succeeded, Zhenghe third year, convicted harbored Wei crown prince favored woman, also cursed emperor, should be executed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Lu succeeded him. In the third year of Zhenghe, he was convicted of harboring the Wei crown prince's favored woman and also cursing the emperor, and should have been executed.

cells.content: 臨淮
cells.literal: Lin Huai
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Lin Huai

cells.content: 臨蔡侯孫都
cells.literal: Lin Cai Marquis Sun Du
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Lin Cai: Sun Du

cells.content: 以南粵郎，漢軍破番禺，為伏波得南粵相呂嘉，侯，千戶。
cells.literal: As Nanyue attendant, Han army broke Panyu, as Fu Bo obtained Nanyue chancellor Lu Jia, marquis, thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As Nanyue attendant when Han army broke Panyu, he served as Fu Bo and obtained Nanyue chancellor Lu Jia, and was made marquis with 1000 households.

cells.content: 閏月癸卯封。
cells.literal: Intercalary month guimao day enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guimao day of the intercalary month.

cells.content: 侯襄嗣，太初元年，坐擊番禺奪人虜掠，死。
cells.literal: Marquis Xiang succeeded, Taichu first year, convicted attacked Panyu seized people plundered, died.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Xiang succeeded him. In the first year of Taichu, he was convicted of attacking Panyu and seizing people for plunder, and died.

cells.content: 河內
cells.literal: He Nei
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of He Nei

cells.content: 東城侯居股
cells.literal: Dong Cheng Marquis Ju Gu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Dong Cheng: Ju Gu

cells.content: 以故東粵繇王斬東粵王餘善侯，萬戶。
cells.literal: As former Dongyue You Wang beheaded Dongyue king Yu Shan Hou marquis, ten thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As former Dongyue You Wang who beheaded Dongyue king Yu Shan Hou, he was made marquis with 10,000 households.

cells.content: 閏月癸卯封，二十年，延和三年，坐衛太子舉兵謀反，要斬。
cells.literal: Intercalary month guimao day enfeoffed, twenty years, Yanhe third year, convicted Wei crown prince raised troops plotted rebellion, should be executed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guimao day of the intercalary month. After twenty years, in the third year of Yanhe, he was convicted of the Wei crown prince raising troops to plot rebellion, and should have been executed.

cells.content: 九江
cells.literal: Jiu Jiang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Jiu Jiang

cells.content: 無錫侯多軍
cells.literal: Wu Xi Marquis Duo Jun
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Wu Xi: Duo Jun

cells.content: 以東粵將軍，漢兵至，棄軍降，侯，千戶。
cells.literal: As Dongyue general, Han troops arrived, abandoned army surrendered, marquis, thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As Dongyue general, when Han troops arrived, he abandoned his army and surrendered, and was made marquis with 1000 households.

cells.content: 元年封。
cells.literal: First year enfeoffed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the first year.

cells.content: 侯卯嗣，延和四年，坐與歸義趙文王將兵追反虜，到弘農擅棄兵還，贖罪，免。
cells.literal: Marquis Mao succeeded, Yanhe fourth year, convicted with Guiyi Zhao Wen Wang led troops pursued rebel captives, reached Hongnong arbitrarily abandoned troops returned, redeemed crime, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Marquis Mao succeeded him. In the fourth year of Yanhe, he was convicted of leading troops with Guiyi Zhao Wen Wang to pursue rebel captives, but arbitrarily abandoned the troops and returned upon reaching Hongnong. He redeemed his crime and was dismissed.

cells.content: 會稽
cells.literal: Kuaiji
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Kuaiji

cells.content: 涉都侯喜
cells.literal: She Du Marquis Xi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of She Du: Xi

cells.content: 以父棄故南海太守，漢兵至，以越邑降，子侯，二千四十戶。
cells.literal: Because father abandoned former Nanhai governor, Han troops arrived, surrendered with Yue city, son marquis, two thousand forty households.
cells.idiomatic: Because his father abandoned his post as former Nanhai governor, when Han troops arrived he surrendered with the Yue city, and his son was made marquis with 2040 households.

cells.content: 元年封，八年，太初二年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: First year enfeoffed, eight years, Taichu second year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the first year. After eight years, in the second year of Taichu, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 南陽
cells.literal: Nanyang
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Nanyang

cells.content: 平州侯王唊
cells.literal: Ping Zhou Marquis Wang Gong
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Ping Zhou: Wang Gong

cells.content: 以朝鮮將，漢兵至，降，侯，千四百八十戶。
cells.literal: As Korean general, Han troops arrived, surrendered, marquis, one thousand four hundred eighty households.
cells.idiomatic: As Korean general, when Han troops arrived he surrendered, and was made marquis with 1480 households.

cells.content: 三年四月丁卯封，四年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Third year fourth month dingmao day enfeoffed, four years died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingmao day of the fourth month in the third year, died after four years with no heir.

cells.content: 梁父
cells.literal: Liang Fu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Liang Fu

cells.content: 荻苴侯韓陶
cells.literal: Di Ju Marquis Han Tao
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Di Ju: Han Tao

cells.content: 以朝鮮相將，漢兵圍之，降，侯五百四十戶。
cells.literal: As Korean chancellor general, Han troops surrounded him, surrendered, marquis five hundred forty households.
cells.idiomatic: As Korean chancellor general, when Han troops surrounded him he surrendered, and was made marquis with 540 households.

cells.content: 四月丁卯封，十九年，延和二年薨，封終身，不得嗣。
cells.literal: Fourth month dingmao day enfeoffed, nineteen years, Yanhe second year died, enfeoffed for life, could not succeed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingmao day of the fourth month. After nineteen years, in the second year of Yanhe, he died. He was enfeoffed for life and could not be succeeded.

cells.content: 勃海
cells.literal: Bo Hai
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Bo Hai

cells.content: 澅清侯參
cells.literal: Hao Qing Marquis Shen
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Hao Qing: Shen

cells.content: 以朝鮮尼谿相使人殺其王右渠，降，侯，千戶。
cells.literal: As Korean Ni Xi chancellor sent people killed their king You Qu, surrendered, marquis, thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: As Korean Ni Xi chancellor who sent people to kill their king You Qu and then surrendered, he was made marquis with 1000 households.

cells.content: 六月丙辰封，十一年，天漢二年，坐匿朝鮮亡虜，下獄病死。
cells.literal: Sixth month bingchen day enfeoffed, eleven years, Tianhan second year, convicted hid Korean escaped captives, imprisoned died of illness.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the bingchen day of the sixth month. After eleven years, in the second year of Tianhan, he was convicted of hiding Korean escaped captives and imprisoned until he died of illness.

cells.content: 齊
cells.literal: Qi
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Qi

cells.content: 騠茲侯稽谷姑
cells.literal: Tiao Ci Marquis Ji Gu Gu
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Tiao Ci: Ji Gu Gu

cells.content: 以小月氏右苴王將眾降，侯，千九百戶。
cells.literal: As Xiao Yuezhi right Ju king led multitude surrendered, marquis, one thousand nine hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: As Xiao Yuezhi right Ju king who led his multitude in surrender, he was made marquis with 1900 households.

cells.content: 四年十一月丁未封，三年，太初元年薨，亡後。
cells.literal: Fourth year eleventh month dingwei day enfeoffed, three years, Taichu first year died, no heir.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the dingwei day of the eleventh month in the fourth year. After three years, in the first year of Taichu, he died with no heir.

cells.content: 琅邪
cells.literal: Lang Ye
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Lang Ye

cells.content: 浩侯王恢
cells.literal: Hao Marquis Wang Hui
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Hao: Wang Hui

cells.content: 以故中郎將將兵捕得車師王，侯。
cells.literal: As former Zhonglang general led troops captured Cheshi king, marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As former Zhonglang general who led troops and captured the Cheshi king, he was made marquis.

cells.content: 正月甲申封，一月，坐使酒泉矯制害，當死，贖罪，免。
cells.literal: First month jiashen day enfeoffed, one month, convicted sent Jiuquan arrogated authority harmed, should die, redeemed crime, dismissed.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the jiashen day of the first month. After one month, he was convicted of sending emissaries to Jiuquan who arrogated authority and caused harm. He should have been executed but redeemed his crime and was dismissed.

cells.content: 瓡讘侯杆者
cells.literal: Li Chan Marquis Gan Zhe
cells.idiomatic: Marquis of Li Chan: Gan Zhe

cells.content: 以小月氏王將軍眾千騎降，侯，七百六十戶。
cells.literal: As Xiao Yuezhi king general multitude thousand cavalry surrendered, marquis, seven hundred sixty households.
cells.idiomatic: As Xiao Yuezhi king who as general led a multitude of a thousand cavalry in surrender, he was made marquis with 760 households.

cells.content: 正月乙酉封，二年薨。
cells.literal: First month yiyou day enfeoffed, two years died.
cells.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the yiyou day of the first month, died after two years.

cells.content: 六月，侯勝嗣，五年，天漢二年薨，制所幸封，不得嗣。
河東
幾侯張阍
以朝鮮王子漢兵圍朝鮮降侯。
三年癸未封，六年，使朝鮮，謀反，格死。
河東
涅陽康侯最
以父朝鮮相路人，漢兵至，首先降，道死，子侯。
三月壬寅封，五年，太初元年薨，亡後。
齊
海西侯李廣利
以貳師將軍擊大宛斬王，侯，八千戶。
太初四年四月丁巳封，十一年，延和三年，擊匈奴兵敗，降。
新畤侯趙弟
以貳師將軍騎士斬郁成王首，侯。
四月丁巳封，七年，太始三年，坐為太常鞠獄不實，入錢百萬贖死，而完為城旦。
齊
承父侯續相如
以使西域發外王子弟，誅斬扶樂王首，虜二千五百人，侯，千百五十戶。
太始三年五月封，五年，延和四年四月癸亥，坐賊殺軍吏，謀入蠻夷，祝詛上，要斬。
東萊
開陵侯成娩
以故匈奴介和王將兵擊車師，不得封年。
侯順嗣。
質侯褒嗣，薨，亡後。
秺侯商丘成
以大鴻臚擊衛太子，力戰，亡它意，侯，二千一百二十戶。
延和二年七月癸巳封，四年，後二年，坐為詹事侍祠孝文廟，醉歌堂下曰「出居，安能鬱鬱」，大不敬，自殺。
濟陰
重合侯莽通
以侍郎發兵擊反者如侯，侯，四千八百七十戶。
七月癸巳封，四年，後二年，坐發兵與衛尉潰等謀反，要斬。
勃海
德侯景建
以長安大夫從莽通共殺如侯，得少傅石德，侯，三千七百三十五戶。
七月癸巳封，四年，後二年，坐共莽通謀反，要斬。
濟南
題侯張富昌
以山陽卒與李壽共得衛太子，侯，八百五十八戶。
���月封，四年，後二年四月甲戌，為人所賊殺。
鉅鹿
邗侯李壽
以新安令史得衛太子，侯，一百五十戶。
九月封，三年，坐為衛尉居守，擅出長安界，送海西侯至高橋，又使吏謀殺方士，不道，誅。
河內
轑陽侯江喜
以圉嗇夫捕反者故城父令公孫勇侯，千一百二十戶。
二年十一月封。
六年，侯仁嗣，永光四年，坐使家丞上書還印符，隨方士，免。
清河
當塗康侯魏不害
以圉守尉捕反者淮陽胡倩侯，侯聖與議定策，益封，凡二千二百戶。
十一月封，薨。
愛侯聖嗣。
剌侯楊嗣。
戴侯向嗣。
九江侯堅居嗣，居攝二年，更為翼漢侯，王莽篡位，為翼新侯，莽敗，絕。
蒲侯蘇昌
以圉小史捕反者故越王子鄒起侯，千二十六戶。
十一月封。
侯夷吾嗣，鴻嘉三年，坐婢自贖為民後略以為婢，免。
琅邪
丞父侯孫王
以告反者太原白義等侯，千一百五十戶。
四年三月乙酉封，三年，始元元年，坐殺人，會赦，免。
東萊

sentences.zh: 武安、周陽、長平、冠軍、平津、周子南、樂通、牧丘、富民九人在外戚恩澤，南奅、龍镪、宜春、陰安、發干五人隨父，凡八十九人，王子不在其中。

cells.content: 秺敬侯金日磾
以駙馬都尉發覺侍中莽何羅反侯，二千二百一十八戶。
始元二年侯，丙子封，一日薨。
始元二年，侯賞嗣，四十二年薨，亡後。
孫
元始四年，侯常以日磾曾孫紹侯，千戶，王莽敗，絕。
建平敬侯杜延年
以諫大夫告左將軍等反侯，二千戶，以太僕與大將軍先定策，益封，二千三百六十戶。
元鳳元年七月甲子封，二十八年薨。
甘露二年，孝侯緩嗣，十九年薨。
竟寧元年，荒侯業嗣，三十四年薨。
元始二年，侯輔嗣。
濟陽侯憲嗣，建武中以先降梁王，薨，不得代。
宜城戴侯燕倉
以假稻田使者先發覺左將軍桀等反謀，告大司農敞，侯。侯安削戶六百，定七百戶。
七月甲子封，六年薨。
元平元年，刺侯安嗣，四十一年薨。
竟寧元年，釐侯尊嗣，十年薨。
陽朔二年，煬侯武嗣。
濟陰侯級嗣。
弋陽節侯任宮
以故丞相徵事手捕反者左將軍桀，侯，九百一十五戶。
七月甲子封，三十三年薨。
初元二年，剛侯千秋嗣，三十二年薨。
河平三年，愿侯惲嗣，二年薨。
陽朔元年，孝侯岑嗣，二十四年薨。
元始元年，侯固嗣，更始元年，為兵所殺。
商利侯王山壽
以丞相少史誘反者車騎將軍安入丞相府，侯，九百一十五戶。
七月甲子封，十四年，元康元年，坐為代郡太守故劾十人罪不直，免。
徐
成安嚴侯郭忠
以張掖屬國都尉匈奴入寇與戰，斬黎汗王，侯，七百二十四戶。
三年二月癸丑封，七年薨。
本始三年，愛侯遷嗣，四年薨。
元康三年，刻侯賞嗣，四十一年薨。
陽朔三年，●侯長嗣。
潁川釐侯萌嗣，薨，亡後。
平陵侯范明友
以校尉擊反氐，後以將軍擊烏桓，獲王，虜首六千二百，侯，與大將軍光定策，益封，凡二千九百二十戶，
四年七月乙巳封，十一年，地節四年，坐謀反誅。
武當
義陽侯傅介子
以平樂廄監使誅樓蘭王，斬首，侯，七百五十九戶。
七月乙巳封，十三年，元康元年薨。嗣子有罪，不得代。
元始四年，侯長以介子曾孫紹封，更始元年，為兵所殺。
平氏

sentences.zh: 博陸、安陽、宜春、安平、富平、陽平六人在恩澤外戚，桑樂一人隨父，凡十五人。

cells.content: 長羅壯侯常惠
以校尉光祿大夫持節將烏孫兵擊匈奴，獲名王，首虜三萬九千級，侯，二千八百五十戶。
本始四年四月癸巳封，二十四年薨。
初元二年，嚴侯成嗣，十六年薨。
建始三年，愛侯邯嗣，五年薨。
河平四年，侯翕嗣，四十九年，建武四年薨，亡後。
陳留
爰戚靖侯趙長年
以平陵大夫告楚王延壽反，侯，千五百三十戶。
地節二年四月癸卯封，十七年薨。
節侯訢嗣。
永始四年，侯牧嗣，四十年，建武四年，以先降梁王，免。
博成侯張章
以長安男子先發覺大司馬霍禹等謀反，以告期門董忠，忠以聞，侯，三千九百一十三戶。
四年八月乙丑封，九年薨。
五鳳元年，侯建嗣，十二年，建始四年，坐尚陽邑公主與婢姦主旁，數醉罵主，免。
淮陽
高昌壯侯董忠
以期門受張章言霍禹謀反，告左曹楊惲，侯，再坐法，削戶千一百，定七十九戶。
八月乙丑封，十九年薨。
初元二年，煬侯宏嗣，四十一年，建平元年，坐佞邪，免，二年，復封故國，三年薨。
元壽元年，侯武嗣，二年，坐父宏前為佞邪，免。
建武二年五月己巳，侯永紹封。
千乘
平通侯楊惲
以左曹中郎受董忠等言霍禹等謀，以告侍中金安上，侯，二千五百戶。
八月乙丑封，十年，五鳳三年，坐為光祿勳誹謗政治，免。
博陽
都成敬侯金安上
以侍中中郎將受楊惲言霍禹等反謀，傳言止內霍氏禁闥，侯，千七百七十一戶。
八月乙丑封，十一年薨。
五鳳三年，夷侯常嗣，一年薨，亡後。
元始元年，侯欽以安上孫紹封，為王莽誅。
元始元年，戴侯楊嗣，王莽敗，絕。
合陽愛侯梁喜
以平陽大夫告霍徵史、徵史子信、家監迴倫、故侍郎鄭尚時謀反，侯，千五百戶。
元康四年二月壬午封，四十一年薨。
建始二年，侯放嗣。
元始五年，侯萌以喜孫紹封，千戶，王莽敗，絕。
平原
安遠繆侯鄭吉
以校尉光祿大年將兵迎日逐王降，又破車師，侯，坐法削戶三百，定七百九十戶。
神爵三年四月壬戌封，十一年薨。
初元元年，侯光嗣，八年，永光三年薨，亡後。
居攝元年，侯永以吉曾孫紹封，千戶，王莽敗，絕。
慎
歸德靖侯先賢撣
以匈奴單于從兄日逐王率眾降，侯，二千二百五十戶。
四月戊戌封，二十六年薨。
竟寧元年，煬侯富昌嗣，二年薨。
建始二年，侯諷嗣，五十六年薨。
建武二年，侯襄嗣。
汝南侯霸嗣，永平十四年，有罪免。
信成侯王定
以匈奴烏桓屠驀單于子左大將軍率眾降，侯，千六百戶，後坐弟謀反，削百五戶。
五鳳二年九月癸巳封，十二年薨。
初元五年，侯廣漢嗣，三年，永光三年薨，亡後。
元始五年，侯楊以定孫紹封，千戶。
細陽
義陽侯厲溫敦
以匈奴謼連累單于率眾降，侯，千五百戶。
三年二月甲子封，四年，坐子伊細王謀反，削爵為關內侯，食邑千戶。

sentences.zh: 陽都、營平、平丘、昌水、陽城、爰氏、扶陽、高平、陽城、博陽、邛成、將陵、建成、西平、平恩、平昌、樂陵、平臺、樂昌、博望、樂成二十一人在恩澤外戚，樂平、冠陽、酇、周子南君四人隨父，凡三十六人。

cells.content: 義成侯甘延壽
以使西域騎都尉討郅支單于斬王以下千五百級，侯，四百戶，孫遷益封，凡二千戶。
竟寧元年四月戊辰封，九年薨。
陽朔元年，煬侯建嗣，十九年薨。
建平元年，節侯遷嗣，居攝二年更為誅郅支侯，十四年薨。
建國二年，侯相嗣，建武四年，為兵所殺。
駟望忠侯冷廣
以濕沃公士告男子馬政謀反，侯，千八百戶。
鴻嘉元年正月辛丑封，薨。
侯何齊嗣，王莽敗，絕。
琅邪
延鄉節侯李譚
以尉氏男子捕得反者樊並侯，千戶。
永始四年七月己巳封，十三年薨。
元始元年，侯成嗣，王莽敗，絕。
新山侯稱忠
以捕得反者樊並侯，千戶。
十一月己酉封。
童鄉釐侯鍾祖
以捕得反者樊並侯，千戶。
七月己酉封，薨，亡後。
元始五年，侯匡以祖子紹封，王莽敗，絕。
樓虛侯訾順
以捕得反者樊並侯，千戶。
七月己酉封。

sentences.zh: 安平、平恩、扶陽三人隨父，陽平、樂安二人在恩澤外戚，凡六人。
安昌、高陽、安陽、城陽、高陵、定陵、殷紹嘉、宜鄉、氾鄉、博山十人在恩澤外戚，武陽、博陽、贊、騏、龍镪、開陵、樂陵、博望、樂成、安平、平阿、成都、紅陽、曲陽、高平十五人隨父，凡三十人。
